TopicTitle: From the original creator of kerbal history: Kerbal history REVAMPED!

Articles.Content: Hi guys, i'm back from stasis sleep. Can we restart the thread from Year 100 again? Write in chronological order, thanks!

We're going to need a History Threads History Thread to keep track of all the Kerbal History threads.

Year 100: The original Kerbal History is created

Year 200: Kerbal History dies off

Year 400: Kerbal History 2 created
ok i'll do that, as to take responsibility of Kerbal history as its creator.

inb4 thread gets closed for being redundant. Sadly, I think the whole Kerbal History concept is kinda dead by this point due to too many people having radically different ideas about the tone of the overall thing and what level of silliness should apply. On the one end we've got the alternate history buffs who keep making stories about land being conquered and traded between the Krepublics, KSSRs, etc. and on the other hand we have people saying the universe gets destroyed every five years by giant space ponies. In the end it's just a confusing mess :\
